subject: Horse Racing
Zenyatta (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: If Rapid Redux, who was claimed for $6,500 last October, wins his 17th consecutive race Friday, he will be three away from breaking Zenyatta’s record of 19 straight.
snippet: If Rapid Redux, who was claimed for $6,500 last October, wins his 17th consecutive race Friday, he will be three away from breaking Zenyatta’s record of 19 straight.
